titles: The principles of the Cyprianic age with regard to episcopal power and jurisdiction asserted and recommended from the genuine writings of St. Cyprian himself and his contemporaries : by which it is made evident that the vindicator of the Kirk of Scotland is obligated by his own concession to acknowledge that he and his associates are schismaticks : in a letter to a friend / by J.S.
author: Sage, John, 1652-1711.
notes: Written by John Sage.  Cf. DNB.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
keywords: Rule, Gilbert, 1629?-1701. --  Defence of The vindication of the Church of Scotland.
